headline: CON EDISON LEADERSHIP TO WEBCAST INVESTOR PRESENTATION ON OCTOBER 7
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (NYSE: ED) will webcast an investor presentation, Delivering Reliable and Resilient Energy for the Future, from 8:30 a.m. to 10 a.m. Eastern Time on Tuesday, October 7, 2025. The presentation will be followed by a question-and-answer session.
